_text_: Once eStatements service is enabled, you will stop receiving your account statements on paper for the selected account. eStatements are quicker, efficient and environment friendly way to receive your account statements. You can disable this service at any time to start receiving your account statements on paper again

You can disable this service at any time to start receiving your account statements on paper again
